Key Match Events: Shadab Khan found Bavuma’s edge, increasing the DLS par to 66
Aiden Markam was dismissed, increasing the DLS par to 77
Tristan Stubbs and Heinrich Klaasen biffed it around but the ask was always going to be too tall
Shadab Khan got Bavuma with a topspinner, bowling Markram with a topspinner in just three balls
Quinton de Kock was dismissed for a duck, and now all eyes were on Temba Bavuma
Mohammad Nawaz was dismissed against the run of play, missing a boundary with a slog sweep for six
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan have won all four encounters against South Africa at T20 World Cups
Pakistan have also emerged victorious from six of their last nine World Cup meetings against South Africa
South Africa's last recognised middle-order hitter has been dismissed, Wayne Parnell tried to get cute with the paddle but missed and was hit on the pads by Mohammad Wasim
Heinrich Klaasen is playing his first match in the tournament
Tristan Stubbs has not come good yet
David Miller has been ruled out of the match as a precautionary measure due to lower back muscle spasm so Heinrich Klaasen plays, while Tabraiz Shamsi has been preferred over Keshav Maharaj

Fakhar Zaman has been ruled out of the match with a recurrence of the knee injury he carried into the tournament and replaced by Mohammad Haris, which means there will be a change to Pakistan's line-up
Post-Match Reflections: Pakistan have kept their semi-final hopes alive with victory in a rain-reduced, much-win match over their favourite opponents: South Africa
Pakistan recovered from 95 for 5 to post their fifth-highest score against South Africa, and highest at World Cups
South Africa remain second on the points’ table and need to beat Netherlands on Sunday to keep their fate in their own hands
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain delays led to the game being postponed until the next day
An hour’s interruption cut six overs off the chase
Mohammad Nawaz was dropped by Aiden Markram at long-on but then Stubbs got under a skier at deep mid-wicket as Shadab decided the aerial route was the only option
Then, Mohammad Wasim top-edged Anrich Nortje, and Temba Bavuma zooted in from the ring
And in the next over, Iftikhar decided to take on Rabada against at the end hit him to long-on where Rilee Rossouw took a superb catch
